trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: A BuildPropertyGroup object can represent a element in the project, or a virtual collection of properties, such as global properties or environment variable properties.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto BuildPropertyGroup pode representar um elemento no projeto ou um conjunto de propriedades, como propriedades globais ou propriedades da variável de ambiente virtual.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new PropertyGroup element in the specified project.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa um novo elemento PropertyGroup no projeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: See [PropertyGroup Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information on property groups.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [elemento PropertyGroup (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter mais informações sobre grupos de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The name of the Project in which to add the new PropertyGroup.
trans-unit.target: O nome do projeto no qual você deseja adicionar o novo PropertyGroup.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref> com especificado <> </> *> e <> </> *> para o <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>para atribuir o novo valor da propriedade <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*>para atribuir o novo valor da propriedade <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref> com especificado <> </> *> e <> </> *> para o <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>para atribuir o novo valor da propriedade <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*>para atribuir o novo valor da propriedade <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to treat the `propertyValue` parameter as a literal value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para tratar o `propertyValue` parâmetro como um valor literal; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup.Condition*> property value and all <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> objects from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup.Condition*>valor da propriedade e todos os <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref> objetos o <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup.Condition*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep or shallow copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia profunda ou superficial o <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> references the same property group as the original.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia superficial de uma <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>referencia o mesmo grupo de propriedade original.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>

trans-unit.source: Modifications a shallow copy will be reflected in both copies.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia superficial será refletida em ambas as cópias de modificações.

trans-unit.source: A deep copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> creates a new XML element to reference so that both copies of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> can be independently modified.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia em profundidade de uma <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>cria um novo elemento XML para fazer referência para que as duas cópias do <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>pode ser modificado de forma independente.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> </xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> corresponds directly to a element in the project (rather than corresponding to a collection of virtual properties, such as environment variable and global properties), only deep copies are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>corresponde diretamente a um elemento no projeto (em vez de correspondente a uma coleção de propriedades virtuais, como ambiente de propriedades globais e variáveis), apenas profundo cópias são permitidas.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to create a deep copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para criar uma cópia em profundidade do <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia do <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the `Condition` attribute value of the property group.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o `Condition` valor do grupo de propriedades do atributo.

trans-unit.source: The `Condition` attribute value of the property group.
trans-unit.target: O `Condition` do grupo de propriedades do valor do atributo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica o número de <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> object can represent a element in the project, or a virtual collection of properties, such as global properties or environment variable properties.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>objeto pode representar um elemento no projeto ou um conjunto de propriedades, como propriedades globais ou propriedades da variável de ambiente virtual.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>

trans-unit.source: An integer value representing the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que representa o número de <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref> objetos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um enumerador que itera por meio de <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que o chamador usar o `foreach` instrução da linguagem c# (`for each` na [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) para iterar pelos <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty>objetos em <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> </xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> individuais

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the entire <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>para todo o <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the property group was imported into the project.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o grupo de propriedades foi importado para o projeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property group was imported into the project; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o grupo de propriedades foi importado para o projeto. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> object in this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref> object na <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> to get or set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>valor o <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref> para obter ou definir.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> object in this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> object in this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref> do <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref> para remover.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref> com especificado <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>do <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>

trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>valor o <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref> remover.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the condition for imported property groups.
trans-unit.target: Define a condição para grupos de propriedade importada.

trans-unit.source: Changes are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: As alterações não são mantidas.

trans-unit.source: The condition to add to the imported PropertyGroup.
trans-unit.target: A condição para adicionar a PropertyGroup importado.
